page.title: 12THE NEW BY_PASS
page.content: Annfield Plain By-Pass was started in Autumn 1984.The Eastern section goes to Catchgate;the Western section to Greencroft.Before the by-pass was built there were woods,a pond and fields.We know this because we visited the site with our teacher. The by-pass will be built in different stages.First the ground is cleared with an excavator and dumper trucks.Next, dolomite will be laid and levelled with a grader and roller.A roadbase and basecourse are laid on top and finally a wearing course.A roundabout will join the new road to Morrison Road. Mr.Wingrove the engineer,showed us the ground being cleared on the newly started Eastern section.Mr.Wingrove hopes it will be open by mid 1986.We enjoyed splodging in the mud best on our visit to the site.
